item.title: Training Resources
item.description: Current training resources for the lab Intro: Software Capentry Shell R Git/Github Data Analysis: Data Carpentry Data analysis and visualisation in R Best practice spreadsheets for use later in R Merriman Lab R tutorial Intro lesson Stats lesson Programming lesson ggplot2 lesson Additional: R dplyr ggplot2 RMySQL Rmarkdown ssh computer storage databases SNPmax SQL using statistics
